an7.7:1.1: Atha kho uggo rajamahamatto yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho uggo rajamahamatto bhagavantam etadavoca:
an7.7:2.2: Yava addho cayam, bhante, migaro rohaneyyo yava mahaddhano yava mahabhogo”ti.
an7.7:2.3: “Kiva addho panugga, migaro rohaneyyo, kiva mahaddhano, kiva mahabhogo”ti?
an7.7:2.4: “Satam, bhante, satasahassanam hirannassa, ko pana vado rupiyassa”ti.
an7.7:2.5: “Atthi kho etam, ugga, dhanam netam ‘natthi’ti vadamiti.
an7.7:2.6: Tanca kho etam, ugga, dhanam sadharanam aggina udakena rajuhi corehi appiyehi dayadehi.
an7.7:2.7: Satta kho imani, ugga, dhanani asadharanani aggina udakena rajuhi corehi appiyehi dayadehi.
an7.7:2.9: Saddhadhanam, siladhanam, hiridhanam, ottappadhanam, sutadhanam, cagadhanam, pannadhanam.
an7.7:2.10: Imani kho, ugga, satta dhanani asadharanani aggina udakena rajuhi corehi appiyehi dayadehiti.
